text:
Due to the holiday period, we'll hold the R Contributor Office Hour on the second Thursday in January rather than the first.

If you're interested in attending the Americas-friendly hour, please help identify a good time by responding to this poll: <https://doodle.com/meeting/organize/id/dL7OKrDb>.

The EMEA/APAC hour will be held at 10:00 UTC.

So far, we have used the office hours to look at one easy bug (November - fixed) and one trickier bug (December - ongoing work), see the minutes if you want the details: <https://github.com/r-devel/rcontribution/tree/main/office_hours>. The office hour can also be used for (discussing) work on translations or other contributions.

Thanks!
